text: Dragonwyck is a 1946 American drama movie directed by first time director Joseph L. Mankiewicz and was based on the 1944 novel of the same name by Anya Seton. It stars Gene Tierney, Walter Huston, Vincent Price, Glenn Langan, Anne Revere, Spring Byington, Harry Morgan, Jessica Tandy and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Joseph L. Mankiewicz Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Dragonwyck (movie)
